channel.title: Quality3Ds Daily Pulse
channel.description: Curated daily news for 3D printing enthusiasts.

item.title: 3D PRINTING PULSE #24 - 2026-01-31
item.description:
√∞≈∏¬¶¬∫ Nivalon Creates a Custom, Metal-Free Spinal Implant Using XJet 3D Printing Nivalon Medical Technologies says it has successfully produced a fully patient-specific spinal implant that preserves motion and contains no metal, using AI-based design and ceramic 3D printing. The implant is, reported by 3DPrint.com on Jan 30, 2026. Read more ? https://3dprint.com/323596/nivalon-creates-a-custom-metal-free-spinal-implant-using-xjet-3d-printing

√∞≈∏≈°‚Ç¨ Printerior Launches Circdal to Build a Sustainable Architectural Ecosystem with 3D Printing Robotic arm systems gradually gained traction for years in the large-format additive manufacturing (AM) space, before experiencing a legitimate breakout year in 2025. Pellet extrusion has been the clear winner, reported by 3DPrint.com on Jan 30, 2026. Read more ? https://3dprint.com/323583/printerior-launches-circdal-to-build-a-sustainable-architectural-ecosystem-w-3d-printing

item.title: 3D PRINTING PULSE #23 - 2026-01-30
item.description:
ü¶∫ 3D-printed planning enables complex elbow reconstruction in Vietnam The use of additive manufacturing is gaining increasing importance in Vietnam‚Äôs healthcare system, as demonstrated by a recent case from the Vinmec Healthcare System . There, physicians succeeded in implanting a rarely used total elbow megaprosthesis in a patient with a severe elbow deformity that had persisted for decades, reported by 3Printr on Jan 29, 2026. Read more ? https://www.3printr.com/3d-printed-planning-enables-complex-elbow-reconstruction-in-vietnam-4586558

üñ® Creality teases closed-loop filament recycling with Shredder R1 and Filament Maker M1 Creality previewed a two-machine workflow that shreds failed prints into small particles and extrudes them back into usable filament. The company says the system targets a closed-loop setup for home shops and plans to launch via crowdfunding, with pricing not yet announced. Read more ? https://www.hackster.io/news/creality-promises-a-closed-loop-filament-workflow-with-the-shredder-r1-and-filament-maker-m1-341ac48e749d

item.title: 3D PRINTING PULSE #22 - 2026-01-29
item.description:
ü¶∫ Chinese researchers successfully use 3D printed titanium prostheses in wrist tumor treatment Researchers at a Chinese hospital have developed a surgical technique that combines 3D printed all-metal prostheses with mesh patches for the treatment of distal radial giant cell tumors (GCT). The ‚Ä¶ The post Chinese researchers successfully use 3D printed titanium prostheses in wrist tumor treatment appeared first on VoxelMatters - The heart of additive manufacturing. Image ? https://www.voxelmatters.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/1-150x150.jpg Read more ? https://www.voxelmatters.com/chinese-researchers-successfully-use-3d-printed-titanium-prostheses-in-wrist-tumor-treatment

üöÄ Volkmann introduces PowTReX automated powder handling system Volkmann USA, a powder handling equipment manufacturer based in Bristol, Pennsylvania, has introduced the next generation of its PowTReX automated metal powder conveying system. First launched in 2018, the PowTReX platform is designed to support metal additive manufacturing operations producing large volumes of parts using multiple 3D printers, reported by 3D Printing Industry on Jan 28, 2026. The post Prusa Launches Safer Global Alternative To IPA appeared on Fabbaloo. Read more ? https://www.fabbaloo.com/news/prusa-launches-safer-global-alternative-to-ipa

üè† Siraya Tech Fibreheart TPU-GF: TPU with 15% glass fiber to prevent shrinkage and warping Siraya Tech has announced Fibreheart TPU-GF, a TPU-based composite filament containing 15 percent glass fiber. The material is aimed at functional components that require classic TPU qualities such as toughness and energy absorption, but also need greater dimensional stability and mechanical load-bearing capacity, reported by 3Printr on Jan 27, 2026. Read more ? https://www.3printr.com/siraya-tech-fibreheart-tpu-gf-tpu-with-15-glass-fiber-to-prevent-shrinkage-and-warping-3686507

üñ® BamBuddy: Open-source tool replaces Bambu Cloud for managing and automating 3D printing jobs BamBuddy is an open-source project that aims to manage Bambu Lab 3D printers without connecting to the manufacturer‚Äôs cloud services. Many devices today use Bambu Lab‚Äôs online ecosystem for remote monitoring, job control, profile sharing, and access to MakerWorld, reported by 3Printr on Jan 27, 2026. item.title: 3D PRINTING PULSE #19 - 2026-01-26
item.description:

item.description:

Reported by VoxelMatters on Jan 23, 2026. Read more ? https://www.voxelmatters.com/ornl-researchers-combine-multiple-3d-printing-extruders/

item.title: 3D PRINTING PULSE #17 - 2026-01-24
item.description:
ü´Åüß¨ VR + 3D Printing Could Help Repair Lungs (Not Replace Them) Researchers are combining virtual reality planning with 3D printing to explore new ways to bridge damaged lung sections. The RI-MUHC team in Montreal is using VR lung models to plan 3D-printed hollow connectors that could link healthy tissue to bypass damaged areas (reported Jan 8, 2026). Read more ? https://3dprintingindustry.com/news/muhc-researchers-test-vr-and-3d-printing-for-better-lung-repair-247926/

üöÄüõ†Ô∏è Rocket Lab Shows Why 3D-Printed Engines Are Here to Stay Additive manufacturing is still a core advantage for faster rocket iteration and production. Rocket Lab's Rutherford engine relies heavily on metal 3D-printed components, highlighted during a Jan 13, 2026 visit covered by VoxelMatters. Read more ? https://www.voxelmatters.com/secretary-hegseth-visits-rocket-lab-and-divergent/

üè†üèóÔ∏è 3D-Printed Homes: ICON's "Printed Neighborhood" Playbook Goes Mainstream 3D-printed housing is shifting from novelty builds to repeatable community construction. Fine Homebuilding reports ICON is building 12 new 3D-printed homes in Austin, Texas, using gantry printers to create structural walls with built-in cavities for utilities (published Jan 12, 2026). Read more ? https://www.finehomebuilding.com/2026/01/12/printed-houses-are-here

üñ®Ô∏èüåà Bambu Lab Watch: H2C Is "On the Way" (Multi-Tool Ambitions Continue) Bambu is openly teasing what's next in its H-series ecosystem, signaling more capability ahead. In a company blog update dated Jan 7, 2026, Bambu Lab discusses the H2C roadmap and the business tradeoffs of announcing it alongside existing H-series models. Read more ? https://blog.bambulab.com/h2c-is-on-the-way-heres-how-it-all-started/

üì∑üîç 3D Scanners: Creality's "Sermoon P1" Goes Standalone at CES 2026 Creality is pushing scanning toward grab-and-go workflows without needing a laptop tether. The Sermoon P1 was shown at CES 2026 as an all-in-one 3D scanner with an integrated computer, display, and battery (posted Jan 10, 2026). Read more ? https://www.3printr.com/creality-unveiled-its-new-sermoon-p1-all-in-one-3d-scanner-at-ces-2026-1086140/

ü§ñü©ª AM Software Breakthrough: AI Reads X-Ray Print Data Faster for Better Metal Parts Quality control is getting a speed boost as AI starts "watching" metal prints more intelligently. UCL researchers introduced AM-SegNet to rapidly process X-ray images captured during metal AM, aiming to improve reliability for demanding applications (published Jan 13, 2026). Read more ? https://3dprintingindustry.com/news/ucl-team-develops-ai-tool-to-monitor-metal-additive-manufacturing-248041/

üß†ü§ñ Multi-Material Printing Expands Horizons with AtomForm Palette 300 At CES 2026, AtomForm's Palette 300 impressed with 12 nozzles capable of mixing 36 colors and 12 materials. The system points toward richer multi-material workflows for creative and functional prints (coverage by Android Authority). Read more ? https://www.androidauthority.com/atomform-palette-300-3d-printer-3630645/

üì°üìà Industry Forecast: Metal AM Moves Toward True Production Scale Across aerospace and defense and beyond, experts see industrial metal additive manufacturing shifting from prototype to production. Analysts expect certified hardware and materials to rise in use as companies expand full-scale metal AM output in 2026. Read more ? https://3dprint.com/322917/3d-printing-predictions-2026-industrial-production-in-metal-additive-manufacturing/

item.title: 3D PRINTING PULSE #7 - 2026-01-14
item.description:
?? Bambu Lab Awarded Patent for Intelligent Speed Adjustment Bambu Lab continues to innovate with a new patent for an intelligent speed-adjusting method. This technology aims to automatically enhance print quality by adjusting parameters in real-time based on print conditions. Read more ? https://fabbaloo.com

?? Kelowna Cancer Centre Personalizes Radiation with 3D Printing Medical professionals in Kelowna are leveraging 3D printing to improve patient outcomes. The centre is using custom 3D-printed boluses to precisely personalize radiation therapy for cancer patients. Read more ? https://3dprintingindustry.com

?? U.S. NDAA 2026 Targets Additive Manufacturing Supply Chain The latest National Defense Authorization Act introduces new restrictions on 3D printing systems for defense. The act focuses on securing the supply chain by limiting procurement of systems tied to specific foreign entities. Read more ? https://3dprintingindustry.com

?? 3D Printed Rammed Earth: A New Era for Sustainable Housing Large-scale construction is looking to the past to build the future with rammed earth 3D printing. This technique combines one of humanity's oldest building materials with modern robotics for sustainable architecture. Read more ? https://fabbaloo.com

?? Bambu Lab A1 Printers Empower Prosthetic Production in Guatemala Brent Wright and the LifeEnabled foundation are bringing low-cost prosthetics to those in need. Utilizing a fleet of Bambu A1 printers, the team is producing functional prosthetic feet directly in the field. Read more ? https://3dprint.com

?? MUHC Researchers Combine VR and 3D Printing for Lung Repair Innovations in respiratory medicine are seeing the fusion of virtual reality and additive manufacturing. Researchers are testing these technologies to create more accurate models for complex lung repair procedures. Read more ? https://3dprintingindustry.com
